ValidationRule.description: Cannot change Start Date and End Date if a Service Request is linked, as these datesare pulled from the SR.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR (ISCHANGED( Start_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( Closed_Date__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Service_Request__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Start Date and Closed Date cannot be changed in this form. They are derived from the related Service Request.
